channel.title: Stay off school! the easy way
channel.description: want 1 more day off school? if so then folo these simple steps. step1: practise lie'iing step2: get some horrible food and mash it up. ( i use chiken soup and brown source ) step3: stay awake till everyone else is asleep step4: put the food on the floor and mash it into your floor step5: spray deoderant everywere step6: tell your mum or dad your ill step7: tell me if it worked. ( it works for me ) step8: lick it up "Optinal"

item.title: Stay off school! the easy way
item.dc:creator: @Whiskey Whiskey
item.description:
@Whiskey wrote:

Easier way:

My school has an attendance e-mail address. I just e-mail them from my MSN address and say:

‘My son ‘insertnamehere’ wont be in today due to an upset stomach’

then I just go out and play with my friends who do the same…

Read full topic
